input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item keywords and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
Equibarre with Angelea Kelly Walkup

Item keywords:
ballet barre style workout, enlongating muscles 
end goal is longer, toned body with a stronger core without adding bulk
does not require special gym equipment
easy to follow
can be adjusted to all levels of athletic abilities
Dancer, equestrian
Six segments: warm up, conditioning, flexibility
Customize daily workout
5 to 20 minutes

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Looking for a way to get in shape without having to go to the gym? Look no further than Equibarre with Angelea Kelly Walkup! This ballet barre-style workout is easy to follow and can be adjusted to all levels of athletic abilities. The end goal is to have a longer, toned body with a stronger core without adding bulk. You'll learn how to customize your daily workout, with six segments: warm up, conditioning, flexibility, and a final stretch. With just 5 to 20 minutes of work each day, you can see results without a lot of time or effort. So why wait? Get started today and see the difference Equibarre with Angelea Kelly Walkup can make!
input_text.Response B: Equibarre with Angelea Kelly Walkup is a ballet barre style workout that promises to elongate muscles and build a longer, toned body with a stronger core. This program does not require any special gym equipment and can be adjusted to all levels of athletic abilities. Angelea Kelly Walkup, a dancer and equestrian, designed this program with six segments: warm up, conditioning, flexibility, and a customized daily workout that can range from 5 to 20 minutes. The goal of this program is to help users achieve a sleek, athletic body without adding bulk.
